welcome_message_body: Welcome to Teresa, Philippines! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's lush natural beauty, warm hospitality, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Teresa has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it is the newest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main domestic terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The secondary domestic terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving mainly low-cost carriers.
